Blog.post: Hiya! Meet again… aihz…. Semalam, semalam..… sungguh tk bagos… yesterdae ada Spf Band… after my MT paper3.. Aih.. Adakah ini takdir ilahi yang berhikmah atau ada udang disebalik batu? Adakah ini yang terbaik buatku ataupun ia adalah rekaan semata-mata? Aku tidak tahu, sungguh tidak.. Aku tidak pasti.. Please help mie sum1, help mie throw tiz stoopid feeling away..Aku sudah cukup sabar dan tidak sanggup lagi..i can’t tolerate with tiz animor..Aku amat sedih entah mengapa..I need a shoulder to cry on..i rili duno if I should be happie or should I rather not/dun.. I’m rili confused ),= Sekarang ni bukannya masa yang tepat untukku bilang to let mie feelings out..i’m juz too upset bout tingie ni.. too speechless to say/speak anitin else. Sooo many tings happened yesterdae.. too much of thinking3.. I’m soo in a mixed feeling.. some happie moments, some sad and disappointing..i rili2 duno she.. Although there’s more happie tings of todae, (I mean, it has yet to be the happiest) but tiz sumtin has juz brought mie too low…………I hav no mood……. I may say it out another day LARHZ…… It’s not the time yet..i’m too miserable..My head spinning with lotsa questions to ask maself n others… Aih…n also thinking of sum1 too……missing him…I’m rili2 moody until today oso we had band…slow mood… Help! Dilemma! For all I can sae was “AAAAAAAAAhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh” all dae long at heart… Tolong mie….. didn’t write yesterdae coz im too lazy n no mood redieZ…now I gtg but pls larhz sapa sak leh tolong… =,(

YAY! No skool at laz! gotta free day after exam..it's only meant for all 3G-ianZ..hEhEe..only us got a daez off school todae..N i mean da whole dae that is..sheesh..dun mind mie..=P of course hapie.. we need not go to skool todae coz we neither take art nor POA..great..all other classes in Springfield now are mugging on deir paperz..AhacKz..actuali i planned goin out but look at sizzling sun..changed ma mind.. i tink i shall juz stay home.. dun wanna get all black again after since our comp. i shall take a good rest before band starts..and all werkz done.. a perfect time coz i've finished ma examZ.. yeah n good to rez off ma muscles, de brain werk, yea n ma health condition..though, de good news is i'm getting alota better dae by dae n i'm soo glad..cant be happier..i'm de happiezt gerl eva! hope it doeznt cum again.. it's damn painful i tell ya.. i'm very sure all de asthmaticz n bronchitizt noe how it feelz lyk to be living ur life wif tiz illness..hope i wun need to sae dat but i did..still cant forget how i felt on dat one particular dae after ma burfdae..when i was admitted to ICU dere..felt like i cud die on de spot rili painful..it juz seemed i cant forget it..sumor its like ma burfdae prezzie like dat.. very sad n i'm all alone in d room with pokes here n dere.. n its about 2weeks before comp. wher its ma once in a lifetime experience..dun wanna live life with it anymore.. well, before i tink of it more n start crying..better drop de subject..carrying with mie tiz feelin, leadz mie to taokin bout one unfortunate thing..it would be..........hmmm........ let mie see... of course de out coming resultZ.. hope it would turn out fine.. i did ma beZ n shall not regretZ..coz i take pride in how far i hav come n hav faith in how far i can go.. dun wanna disappoint ma parentz coz can sae larhz dat im deir only hope.. tiz mid yr,wher it'z ma 1st tym in sec3,am doin ma bez to show ma zest as i'm aming for A'z for both of ma Mathz..maybe an A2 for A Mathz(although its a new sub)..definitely a distinction for ma E Mathz n of course for Mother Tongue too.English lang no need to sae, as long as i dun fail em (well, of course i'd nvr n wud nvr)..a lil lower for my new subs like ma Pure Sciences n Social Studiez larhz..didnt wanna expect much coz if it turns wild, i gonna getta rili upset! so juz aiming a B3 after all ma failings in these subs..i'm bored wif de failing werd an 'F'..yeah n dats it... jus looking forward to learning n studying ma fav sub other than Maths, Geography - which we'll start it off in term3 onwardz.. klah, i tink i better get going before i get over de limitationz.. KieZ KieZ, i'll cum back nxt tym..talked too muchie redieZ.. ChaoZ,'Adawiya..c",)
